<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve Artifact Metadata"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/artifact"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve metadata for a specific artifact based on its fully qualified name (FQN).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"source","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The source of the artifact."},{"name":"author","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The author of the artifact."},{"name":"name","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The name of the artifact."},{"name":"identifier","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Either the version hash or tag of the artifact."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response with artifact metadata.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Metadata of an artifact.","required":["fqn","versionHash","createdAt","pulls","tags"],"properties":{"fqn":{"type":"object","description":"Fully qualified name of an artifact.","required":["source","author","name"],"properties":{"source":{"type":"string","description":"The source of the artifact."},"author":{"type":"string","description":"The author of the artifact."},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the artifact."}},"title":"FQN"},"versionHash":{"type":"string","description":"The version hash of the artifact."},"createdAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The creation timestamp of the artifact."},"pulls":{"type":"integer","description":"The number of times the artifact has been pulled."},"tags":{"type":"array","description":"Tags associated with the artifact.","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"Artifact"}}}},"400":{"description":"The request was malformed or invalid.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"401":{"description":"The provided authentication credentials were invalid."},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to access the requested resource."},"404":{"description":"The requested resource was not found.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"413":{"description":"The request payload is too large.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"500":{"description":"An internal server error occurred. Look at the server logs for more details."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
